attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Given that the once proud nation of Iceland is almost bankrupt I feel it is a perfect opportunity to seize the moment and expand this territory 

Instead of using billions to prop up the failing world economy I petition the UK government to do something bold and brash, think outside the box and buy Iceland. Given this once proud nation is almost bankrupt I feel it is a perfect opportunity to expand her majesty domains, Iceland could be bought at a bargain price; this is a once in a lifetime opportunity to purchase the country that brought us Bjork, Magnus Magnusson and Puffin Pie. 

Why wait, buy Iceland today!

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
